SELECT c.COMMENT_NO AS commentNo , c.CONTENT , u.NICKNAME AS nickName , c.CREATE_DATE AS createDate , c.NOTICE_NO AS noticeNo c.REPORT_NO AS reportNo c.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo TYPE_ERROR_COLUMN
FROM
CP_NT_COMMENT CP_RP_COMMENT CP_RV_COMMENT TYPE_ERROR_TABLE
c JOIN CP_USER u ON u.USER_NO = c.USER_NO WHERE c.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND
c.NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} c.REPORT_NO = #{reportNo} c.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} TYPE_ERROR_COLUMN
ORDER BY c.CREATE_DATE ASC
